snippet: Mimi Sheraton searched New York for classic tastes she remembered from the 1930s to the ’50s. And yes, she found a few.
abstract: Mimi Sheraton searches New York City for true classic tastes and the foods she cherished from the 1930s to the mid ’50s; lists her old-style favorites and where they can be found.
lead_paragraph: Mimi Sheraton searched New York for classic tastes she remembered from the 1930s to the ’50s. And yes, she found a few.

headline.seo: Lost, Then Found: New York Food Classics
headline.main: Lost, Then Found: New York Classics
headline.print_headline: Lost, Then Found: New York Classics
